extras.summary: AN ACT TO REPEAL SECTIONS 23-15-659 AND 23-15-633, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REMOVE THE ABSENTEE BALLOT ENVELOPE REQUIREMENTS; TO AMEND SECTIONS 23-15-625 AND 23-15-627, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO CONFORM; TO AMEND SECTION 23-15-631, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REQUIRE MAIL-IN BALLOTS BE RECEIVED BY MAIL OR COMMON CARRIER NO LATER THAN 7:00 P.M. ON THE DAY OF THE ELECTION; TO AMEND SECTIONS 23-15-637, 23-15-713, 23-15-715 AND 23-15-719, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO CONFORM; TO AMEND SECTION 23-15-639, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REQUIRE THAT MAIL-IN BALLOTS BE ANNOUNCED BY THE RESOLUTION BOARD; TO AMEND SECTION 23-15-651, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REQUIRE THAT ABSENTEE BALLOT VOTES SHALL BE ANNOUNCED SIMULTANEOUSLY WITH BALLOTS CAST ON ELECTION DAY; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 23-15-697, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, FOR THE PURPOSE OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO AMEND SECTION 23-15-721, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO PROVIDE THAT UPON RECEIPT OF AN ABSENTEE BALLOT, THE BALLOT SHALL BE PLACED INSIDE AN OMR VOTING MACHINE; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 23-15-623, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, FOR THE PURPOSE OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO AMEND SECTIONS 23-15-629, 23-15-635, 23-15-641, 23-15-645 AND 23-15-647, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO CONFORM; TO REPEAL SECTION 23-15-643, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH PROVIDES FOR EXAMINING AND CHALLENGING AFFIDAVITS RELATED TO ABSENTEE BALLOTS; TO BRING FORWARD SECTIONS 23-15-697, 23-15-649, 23-15-653 AND 23-15-657, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, FOR THE PURPOSE OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
